title: Blue Milk and Green Water
description: This wonderfully realistic anthology of short stories captures every emotion and takes the reader along for the ride. It also has inspiring lessons on dealing with life rather than simply letting life deal with us. These stories have heart, humor, tolerance, faith, and a depth of human (and animal) understanding that we all would benefit from.Blue Milk and Green Water is the perfect mental escape at the end of a long day.
author: Annette Zoheret
